ygData.subject: New paper on eliminating catastrophic forgetting in simple neural networks
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone. Jeff and I would like to announce our newest paper, Diffusion-based neuromodulation can eliminate catastrophic forgetting in simple neural
